name: Aerospace engineering
details: Aerospace Engineering is a branch of engineering with deals with aircraftand spacecraft. Aerospace engineering is work on research, design

name: Chemical engineering
details: Chemical engineering occupies a unique position at the interface between molecular sciences and engineering. Intimately linked with the fundamental subjects of chemistry, biology,

name: Civil engineering
details: One of the oldest and broadest engineering disciplines, Civil Engineering involves planning, designing, constructing,

name: Computer engineering
details: Computer Engineering combines several disciplines of computer science and electronics to develop computer hardware and software. A computer engineer designs and develops computer systems and other technological devices.

name: Electronic engineering
details: Electronics Engineering is a specialisation of engineering that studies and utilises nonlinear and active electrical components to design the electronic circuits, devices, the integrated circuits and their systems

name: Mechanical engineering
details: Mechanical engineering is a popular branch of engineering. It is a combination of the principles of mathematics, engineering physics, and materials science. It is related to the study of designing, analyzing, maintaining, and manufacturing mechanical systems.
